about.who: Student's toolkit was created within an engineering project and is designed for students of Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science. Our idea was to create a repository of knowledge about courses of the faculty and to share a space for any studies-related matters.
about.what: Student's toolkit connects you with students with simmilar matters. You can ask questions and share information and materials with other students within a selected course group. Save time on searching learning materials sources by easy access to informations on courses and teachers. Make a tutoring offer in course you understand well or ask for help with a subject you don't feel confident about.
about.open-source: This app is based on open source, which allows you to manage and develop it. Together We create an application suited to Our needs.
